column4: Halem - Paken and Bortamuli Area | Mild erosion is seen in Paken downstream area and Bortamuli area. Silt filled B-type Geo nag is being dumped in those areas on 08-09-2022 | 0

Manikpur - Bashbari Part 2 | Erosion of around 1300 mtr. had occurred w.e..f 17/06/2022 to 30/06/2022. One (1) Nos of Relief camp opened due to the said erosion (1) Tilpukhuri ME Madrasa ,Male=45 Female=50 Child=30 Pregnant=0 Disability=0Total=125(Latitude-26.39971 Longitude-90.753438) since 17.06.2022 to till date 01.07.2022/Total Inmates-125. Medical Team- 2 Nos. date- 08.09.2022, Total Population-125 erosion continues to Bashbari par 2. on 08.09.2022. | 0

Dhubri - Chalakura Pt-V | Erosion is going(by the river Brahmaputra) at village Chalakura Pt-V,As per the field verification w.e.f 2/9/22 to 8/09/22 it is seen that till now 38 nos of family has been affected (total area = 65Bigha-2Katha-10Lessa)and they have shifted their houses to another place. No situation has arise for opening of any relief Camp. | 309,  Golakganj - Berbhangi Pt-II | Erosion took place at village Berbhangi Pt-II under Golakganj Revenue Circle from 3-9-2022 to 8-9-2022 by river Gangadhar. In that erosion 0B-1K-0L land has been eroded and a school namely 1722 No. Rowarkuti LP School partly eroded. No population has been affected till now.
